div.h2: Welcome to Painted Desert Montessori Academy

div.h4: Welcome to the Painted Desert Montessori Academy Website!
div.p:
As the only public Montessori school in the West Valley, PDMA hopes to bring more quality education choices to our community. We would love to give you a tour of our beautiful campus!
Click Here to schedule a tour.
We believe education should address not only the academic needs of the children, but also speak to their spirits. Our mission is to provide individualized instruction that fosters a love of learning and respect for all living things. With the Montessori philosophy at the core, children will be guided through hands on learning in a prepared environment.
AVERAGE TEACHER SALARY (A.R.S. 15-189.05)
Average salary of all teachers employed in budget year 2019: $38,461
Average salary of all teachers employed in budget year 2018: $34,933
Increase in average teacher salary from the prior year 2018: $3,528
Percentage increase: 10.1%
ASBCS Dashboard
